header_text: You finish a task due next week for your boss and ask them for their opinion. They say the work is good, apart from an incomplete section. You feel that they think you are careless.

elements.text: In the end, you realize that they brought the error to your attention so you could improve it before sending it in. You fix the incomplete section and believe that your boss head thinks you are...

elements.name: You finish a task due next week for your boss and ask them for their opinion. They say the work is good, apart from an incomplete section. You feel that they think you are careless._Mental Health_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
